imdb.title: Seisenshi Dunbine
imdb.plot: An aspiring Japanese motocross racer is pulled into the world of Byston Well, where he is forcefully recruited into becoming the pilot of a Dunbine, a giant robot guided by his aura.

episodes.title: The Aura Battlers
episodes.plot: After being transported from Earth to Byston Well, Shou is told he will fight for Lord Drake Luft. Later, he is attacked and forced to consider who he is fighting for.

episodes.title: Given's Mansion
episodes.plot: Shou accompanies Lord Drake's envoy to meet with the political enemy, Neal Givens, to negotiate for peace. However, Lord Drake has other plans.

episodes.title: Escape from Laas Wau
episodes.plot: Shou and Elmelie discuss his role in Lord Drake's plan. Later, while the Aura Battlers are on patrol, Neal and his troops launch a surprise attack.

episodes.title: Rimul's Hardships
episodes.plot: Lord Drake sends his troops to find Elmelie as she searches for Neal. Shou decides which side he wants to fight for.

episodes.title: Keen in Danger
episodes.plot: Resentment starts to grow within Keen. As Shou chases after her, Lord Drake's troops begin to close in.

episodes.title: Tragedy at the Forest of the Moon
episodes.plot: Neal attempts to rendezvous with his father's forces. Todd has his orders to hunt down the Given's party.

episodes.title: Night Before the Dawn of the War
episodes.plot: Despite the group's protests, Neal decides to go under cover to rescue Elmelie but quickly finds himself in trouble.

episodes.title: Laas Wau Once Again
episodes.plot: After Shou questions his and Marvel's place in Byston Well, he formulates a plan to go back home and finds that leaving is not as easy as it seems.

episodes.title: Heaven and Earth
episodes.plot: The group takes a dangerous a journey to Fairy Land to find allies for the upcoming civil war.

episodes.title: Father and Child
episodes.plot: After returning from the Land of the Ferario, Keen and the others face an enemy they did not expect, leading to tragic consequences.

episodes.title: Offense and Defense of Kiron Castle
episodes.plot: After rejecting the king's offer of diplomacy, Lord Drake sends his troops to attack the castle while Shou and the others prepare for war.

episodes.title: Garalia's Pursuit
episodes.plot: After Garalia and Todd discover the secret in King Foizon's armory, they launch a surprise attack that tests Shou's strength.

episodes.title: Todd's Violent Advance
episodes.plot: Todd is eager to prove himself after learning about the new recruits from Upper Earth but finds himself in a difficult situation.

episodes.title: Battle at Elf Castle
episodes.plot: Lord Drake launches an attack on Elf Castle and despite his advanced weaponry, his victory is not guaranteed.

episodes.title: Furaon Moves Not
episodes.plot: Shou and others launch a surprise attack against Lord Drake. However, despite the promise of help, they are left on their own.

episodes.title: Skies Over Tokyo
episodes.plot: After facing Garalia in battle, Shou and Cham find themselves in a familiar yet distant world.

episodes.title: The People of Upper Earth
episodes.plot: Shou has a hard time proving who he truly is. Meanwhile, Garalia faces new enemies while she explores her surroundings.

episodes.title: Flash of Garalia
episodes.plot: While Neal continues to fight against Lord Drake's forces, Shou faces a personal battle that leaves deep scars.
